articles.title: BBC Premier League Output In Meltdown As Mutinous Stars Walkout Over Gary Lineker - Deadline
articles.description: UPDATED: The BBC has apologized after its Premier League output went into freefall as mutinous presenters and pundits staged a protest over the suspension of Gary Lineker. The British broadcaster t…
